input.sentences: we stayed at this condo for vacation .
the first place we hit was the pool .
my boyfriend relaxed with a beer .
he did fall asleep and get an uncomfortable sun tan .
at night the boats were all lit up .
output.sentences: Our family went on a beach vacation.
My boyfriend and I hit the pool to relax.
We talked and drank a beer while at the pool.
While at the pool I got a very uncomfortable sun burn.
Even though I was sunburned we had a great time at night looking at all the boats.
